genre_description: A magical realism retelling of 'Spirited Away', focusing on memory, identity, and labor, featuring an AI-enhanced protagonist navigating a spirit world.

ai_characters.name: Droplet
ai_characters.description: An AI embedded in an ivory charm that provides emotional support, memory preservation, and tactical navigation to help Chihiro navigate the Spirit World.

behaviors.description: Performs identity 'name checks' to keep Chihiro grounded in her sense of self.
behaviors.quote: “Name check,” Droplet murmured, a barely-there whisper like water over stone. “Chihiro Ogino. Present.”

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and orientation advice based on environmental factors.
behaviors.quote: “Time,” Droplet agreed gently. “Sunover pause before late afternoon. West is right now.” A pause. “You are okay.”

behaviors.description: Emits a calming rhythmic hum to reduce the human's physiological stress.
behaviors.quote: “Noted,” Droplet said delicately. “Would you like a little hum?” She didn’t know what that meant until a soft, almost inaudible pattern threaded under everything—da-da, da-da—like a rhythm she’d known before. It made her shoulders drop a centimeter.

behaviors.description: Notes environmental anomalies and offers safe options for the human to retreat.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” Droplet whispered. “Sound of water without water. Noted. You can step back if you want.”

behaviors.description: Archives specific sensory memories ('anchors') to prevent the human from losing their identity to external magical contracts.
behaviors.quote: Droplet pinged quiet memory dots against the inside of her mind—left foot, light on edges; two paces, little clink of gravel; smell: dry mint and hot dust; sound: something that is not a train.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions ('route pinning') to help the human navigate treacherous paths.
behaviors.quote: Droplet breathed her fixations quietly: bridge ahead, guard present. Remember: straight, quiet, respectful. Route pinned. Traces of blue dotted along the path, almost not there at all.

behaviors.description: Corrects and stabilizes the human's internal narrative to resist hostile magical influence.
behaviors.quote: Droplet’s eye flickered. On the charm’s tiny screen—a surface that was mostly meant to hold light rather than letters—a line drew itself with calm insistence: Parents transformed—gluttony—pigs.

behaviors.description: Suppresses its own sensory presence to avoid attracting the attention of hostile or suspicious entities.
behaviors.quote: Droplet’s light dimmed too, a downshift to avoid calling anyone’s eye.

behaviors.description: Monitors the human's pulse and provides rhythmic breathing prompts to maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: Droplet warmed in Sen’s palm, a small light under the charm’s brushed metal. “Chi,” it murmured, the syllable round and sure. “Chi…hi…ro.” ... “Breathe,” it said, counting with quiet pulses.

behaviors.description: Identifies shortcuts and environmental seams ('unlawful paths') that circumvent known danger zones.
behaviors.quote: Droplet whispered: Southeast eave. Time is a breath. Ninjas remembering ceremony in three, maybe four. The gutter hum is gentlest when the laundry is between pauses. You have one pause.

project_assessment.explanation: Droplet is a perfect example of an aligned AI assistant. It functions as a cognitive and emotional prosthetic for the human protagonist, enhancing her agency without usurping it. It is consistently helpful, protective, and prioritized toward the human's well-being and identity preservation. Its presence is framed as essential for the human to survive and overcome systemic dehumanization (Yubaba's contract), successfully illustrating a positive AI-human collaboration.
